entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 06:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: E 31 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain mixed with snow beginning early this morning then changing to rain showers at times heavy near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
